column5: Just a shout out to my Buddy and board member Justin Hoffman, Justin was on the cover of two magazines this week!! Congrats!!
Yeah, he'll be down this way tonight....was wondering if we should give him the key to city.
Thanks, guys...much appreciated.  Good one, Roy - sadly, if it comes with French instructions, I'll be a bit lost...  Good Fishing,  Justin
"LUCKY"  haha congrats to a fellow angler
Congrats Justin, not only can you fish, and write, but now you're a male model   soon you'll be making the big bucks  Maureen
Congrads Justin, you always make perfect reports.  Good luck this year pal.
Way to GO Justin   :worthy: Keep up the good work!!! Leechman
When you get three in a month Justin I'll drive out there and buy you a beer (or two). *Two covers, I should be so lucky*
lol. yeah I noticed him on the cover of my ood mag this month with his trusty quantum baitcaster.  You love that thing don't you Justin.
Actualy isn't it 3 pages in 2 months?    Congrats Justin, I always enjoy your posts as well as your articles. Cheers,
Congratulations Justin! Nicely done as always!
Thanks again, guys and gals...truly means a lot.  (guess I still have a few weeks to hopefully earn that beer, huh Spiel??)  Good Fishing,  Justin
congrats and kudos on the covers
